meanings.definition: A person who snatches or takes something quickly or eagerly.
meanings.sent1: The sneaky snatcher grabbed the toy from the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The thief was known as the neighborhood snatcher.
meanings.sent3: The cookie snatcher struck again, stealing all the treats from the jar.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like a snatcher, always scanning for the next opportunity.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the purse snatcher in crowded places.

meanings.definition: A tool or device used for snatching or grabbing objects.
meanings.sent1: The claw snatcher helped pick up trash from hard-to-reach places.
meanings.sent2: The robotic snatcher was designed to assist in construction work.
meanings.sent3: The kitchen snatcher, also known as tongs, was essential for cooking.
meanings.sent4: His hand moved like a snatcher, swiftly grabbing the fallen keys.
meanings.sent5: The snatcher at the end of the stick made it easier to reach items on high shelves.
